t=input()
while(t>0):
    t-=1
    n=input()
    arr=map(int,raw_input().split())
    dp=[]
    for i in range(n):
        dp.append([arr[i]])
    for i in range(1,n):
        for j in range(i):
            if arr[i]>arr[j] and len(dp[i])<=len(dp[j]):
                dp[i].append(arr[j])
    maxi,index=0,0
    for i in range(n):
        if len(dp[i])>maxi:
            maxi=len(dp[i])
            index=i
    print len(dp[index])
    """for i in range(1,len(dp[index])):
        print dp[index][i],
    print dp[index][0]"""
